name: Node Conquest
description:
Be the last kingdom standing or keep more territory by the end of the match.

 Left click to select one or multiple nodes.

 Right click on a node to move units from selected nodes.

  

  • Send units to an empty node to build a camp
  • Send 50 units on a camp to build a fortress.
  • Send 100 units on a fort to upgrade it to a stronghold.
  

Background music:

  • "Sostén" by Megupets
  • "To Them! SCC" by Snabisch
  • "Prepare for War" by Trevor Lentz

SFX from "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by SubspaceAudio
